ai_instructions.USAGE_DIRECTIVE: Extrapolate from patterns to generate exact classes. Do not invent classes.

NAVIGATION.instructions: Lines 1-14: Read AI instructions and bracket notation rules
NAVIGATION.use_grep: Use grep to find specific classes: grep -E 'pattern-[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+' wwwroot/rr-ai-styles.json
NAVIGATION.utility_patterns: Lines 15-79: Auto-discovered utility patterns in bracket notation

CSS_VARIABLES_VS_UTILITIES.EXAMPLE: Use 'opacity-50' for standard styling, 'opacity: var(--opacity-50)' for custom components
CSS_VARIABLES_VS_UTILITIES.CSS_VARIABLES: Use CSS variables (var(--color-primary)) for custom component styling
CSS_VARIABLES_VS_UTILITIES.UTILITY_CLASSES: Use utility classes (pa-4, opacity-50) for standard styling

EXAMPLES: text-[xs, sm, base, lg, xl] means text-xs, text-sm, text-base, text-lg, text-xl
opacity-[0, 25, 50, 75, 100] means opacity-0, opacity-25, opacity-50, opacity-75, opacity-100
BRACKET_NOTATION.FORMAT: prefix-[value1, value2, value3] means prefix-value1, prefix-value2, prefix-value3

ai_instructions.CRITICAL: Use bracket notation for extrapolation. pattern-[value1, value2] means pattern-value1, pattern-value2
